heading: Wednesday
text: Snow tapering off, lingering north of Route 2 until the evening.

heading: Monday Night
text: Clear early. Increasing clouds west to east.
temperature: 0 to 10 below, cold spots northeast 15 below zero.

heading: Tuesday
text: Early sun, then clouds. Snow developing in NY midday, spreading east.

heading: Tuesday Night
text: Snow, moderate to heavy at times.
